name: Air Hawke's Bay
about: Air Hawke's Bay Limited is a renowned flight training academy based in Hastings, New Zealand, with over 80 years of experience in aviation education. As the first NZ training provider accredited with CAA Part 141 and operating under CAA Part 135 certification, AHB offers full-time integrated pilot training from beginner to advanced levels, including Private Pilot Licence, Commercial Pilot Licence, Instrument Rating, and more. Our fleet includes Piper Tomahawks, Cessna 172s, and Twin Engine Piper Senecas, supported by CAA-approved simulators. Located in Hawkeâ€™s Bay, our students benefit from varied geography, clear airspace, and diverse weather patterns, making it an ideal environment for pilot training. With a strong focus on safety, quality, and individualized learning, AHB ensures graduates are well-prepared for global aviation careers. Our internship program and industry connections enhance employment outcomes, making us a leading choice for aspiring pilots.
